text: Balkh Cricket Stadium (; ) is a cricket stadium in Mazar-i-Sharif, Afghanistan. It is currently under construction with financial assistance from USAID and India.Mazar-i-Sharif (Balkh) Cricket Ground. Afghanistan Cricket Board.Construction work of Balkh cricket stadium kicked off. Ariana News. It is hoped that the stadium will be able to attract international teams to play in Afghanistan which became full member of ICC in 2017. ==References== Category:Cricket grounds in Afghanistan Category:Buildings and structures in Afghanistan Category:Mazar-i-Sharif
title: Balkh Cricket Stadium
